ApexPage.description: A horizontal timeline to display Opportunity-related time-based events tracked by the Event/Interaction Tracker, intended as a VisualForce Page element of a standard (non-Console) Opportunity page layout (width 100%, height 150 (no CSAT meter) or 170 (CSAT meter), no scrollbars, no label): suggest placement in a 1-column section named "Timeline", display section header on Detail Page only).
ApexPage.label: Opportunity Timeline (150/170px high)
